CustomField.description: If this is checked, then when we compare the old record value against the record value that was returned from a front end edit. If they are different, we will create a staging record instead of updating the old record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this is checked, then when we compare the old record value against the record value that was returned from a front end edit. If they are different, we will create a staging record instead of updating the old record.
CustomField.label: Is Create Staging Record On Field Change
